mapper.select: select * from film where name = #{name} and createTime <= (select createTime from film where name = #{name} order by createTime desc limit #{fromIndex}, 1) order by createTime desc limit #{currentPageSize};
select count(*) from film where name = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into film (name, director, actor, releaseTime, duration, poster, status) values (#{name}, #{director}, #{actor}, #{releaseTime}, #{duration}, #{poster}, 1)
